DOC.brief_summary: This study two major purpose : 1 . To test developed multiple anatomic functional MRI method ; 2 . To evaluate potential MRI method diagnosis , prognosis , monitor progression renal dysfunction . These purpose achieve perform pilot study cohorts patient .
DOC.detailed_description: This study observational intervention apply patient . In study , multiple anatomic functional MRI method perform three cohort patient . In addition anatomic MRI method , non-contrast enhance functional MRI method also apply evaluate tissue perfusion vascular reactivity patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Englishspeaking primary language 2 . Able complete approximately 75 90 minute cognitive and/or physical test 3 . Capable consent study 1 . Acute psychiatric illness would impede cognitive test 2 . Active chemical dependence , alcohol , narcotic drug 3 . Legally blind unable complete cognitive test due visual loss deafness 4 .
